positions.title: Associate Programmer
positions.description:
Role : Associate Programmer

Robotic process automation (RPA) is the application of technology that allows employees in a company to configure computer software or a “robot” to capture and interpret existing applications for processing a transaction, manipulating data, triggering responses and communicating with other digital systems.

Responsibilities:
Monitoring Jobs and working on failures.
Troubleshooting issue and fixing some of them permanently.
Working with developer team to fix bugs.
Programming views, stored procedures, Cursors and functions.

Applications used in Automation process:
SAP
SQL – Database
Orcle
MS Excel
Internet Explorer (Log Star Website)

…
see more

positions.title: SQL Server Developer
positions.description:
Avante Codeworx Pvt Ltd. Comes under Innowave Technologies Ltd. Avanté Codeworx Pvt Ltd. is a rapidly growing company specializing in providing IT services and software development to Government organizations. We also excel in Web Designing and creating mobile apps for companies. Based out of Pune, we harbor a niche team of professionals with an extensive combined experience in IT field.
Over the years Avanté has handled a variety of projects. Our versatile experience in providing consulting support to both central and state Governments and implementing e-Government projects is unparalleled.
Services include:
• GIS (Geographic information system)
• Building permission process for Municipal Corporation
• Slum Information Management System (SIMS)
• Digitization of Citizen Services.
• Storage Technologies
• Systems Programming
• Network Management
• Application Development
• Web Technologies and Product Development.
Responsibilities
• Writing queries and stored procedures used for front-end applications.
• Designing and coding database tables to store the application’s data.
• Working with application developers to create optimized queries.
• Creating table variables used for stored procedures.
• Creating table indexes to improve database performance .
• Programming views, stored procedures, Cursors and functions.

…
see more
